title: Love, Lies, and Revenge
description: Arianna, Jordan, and Vince have settled into a happy love triangle and are chosen to participate in a newly created international task force. But on the eve of their first assignment one of the trio decides their arrangement is no longer acceptable. When Arianna disappears their new task is to find her. With no clues to go on, the only suspect points back to their old nemesis, Margo Tremblay. Vince and Jordan are forced to work together to get her safely home.But when Arianna is found will she choose to return to her old life, or will she move on with a new love? Or will it all be one big lie? Who will get the ultimate revenge, and who will be left to pick up the pieces?This erotic thriller is intended for adults only. It contains adult language and sexual situations including: M/M/F, M/F, and M/T.
author: Melissa Silvey
